Class Alpaca

    public class Alpaca
extends Animal

    A simple model of a Alpaca. Alpacas move and hunt.

    2015.01.22
    Author:
    Mathijs Lindeboom

    • Constructor Detail

      • Alpaca

        public Alpaca(boolean randomAge,
              Field field,
              Location location)
        Create a Alpaca. A Alpaca can be created as a new born (age zero and not hungry) or with a random age and energy level.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the Alpaca will have random age and hunger level.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.
